page.title: 02INTRODUCTION TWO
page.content: Most people in the area have to travel a number of kilometres to the nearest place of {Employment}.Farmers and farmland do not give much employment although their farms cover much of the land. { Public transport}is limited to Buses, Taxi cabs and Trains.These facilities although limited in their radius of travel,lead into Scunthorpe(the nearest town),where you can find Transport to take you almost anywhere in the country. There are new developments in the area such as the{Enterprise Zone}in the north-eastern corner square.The Enterprise Zone was set up with ten years free rates to encourage new industry. There are no major or minor{Military {Instalations}in the area as 90% is {Rural Landscape.
